Articles.Content:
I was doing an Apollo style mun mission. I had struts attached to the lander and the rocket. Once I had separated the stuts of course no longer connected. However, I only noticed once I got to the mun that the struts had re-connected with one another after I docked. I tried to undock but the vessel wouldn't count and imminently dock again. An image of the struts re-connected and what it was originally in the pictures

Edited April 16, 2023 by Mutant87
